author: Obi-Wan3
description: Various tools for managing custom emojis in servers.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users. If enabled, the `[p]emojitools save` command group saves to folders in the cog data path image files of emojis that server administrators select.
install_msg: Thank you for installing. Use `[p]help emojitools` for more info. **Important**: The `[p]emojitools save` command group will allow admins across all servers to save emojis to folders in the cog data path, any of which they can upload to Discord as a `.zip` archive. For large and/or public bots, it is highly recommended to restrict usage of or disable the `[p]emojitools save` command group. The other cog features do **not** require permanent storage, but may be slightly resource-intensive.
